titleStmt.title: Double your guards; in answer to a bloody and seditious pamphlet, entituled An alarum to the armies of England, Scotland, and Ireland.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

notesStmt.note: "An alarum to the armies of England, Scotland, and Ireland" remains untraced.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
